descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a multi-colored square shape and a separate light blue shape.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the the same as the multi-colored square.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy only the multi-colored square and paste it to the output grid of its same size. Then, copy and paste the separate light blue shape inside of the multi-colored square. Finally, change individual light blue squares to match their nearest colored edge of the multi-color square, but only if...1. they touch the colored edge, and...2. They do not touch any other colored edge.Do not change the color of any black squares.

descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...The same as the colored object.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...Copy the colored object and copy the light blue object inside the colored object.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...2 shapes, one colored circle, and a unique shape
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same size as the circle
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...put the shape inside the circle, keeping the colors of both the same. The exception to keeping all colors the same is the outermost dots of unique shape inside takes the color from the closest ring of the circle but only in the center, not the corners.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a colored pattern with a light blue pattern
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same size as the square that forms the colored pattern.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...add the light blue pattern inside the colored pattern. If there are one, two or three light blue blocks touching the colored side blocks add a block of the same color to replace the block that has the most black blocks touching it. If it has no black blocks touching the colored blocks add two blocks to replace the two light blue blocks in the center of the row or column.
